snippet: Having a baby is a wonderfully happy time and also a stressful one, so it pays to get your financial house in order for the sake of you, your partner and your new child.
abstract: Tara Siegel Bernard Your Money column holds that while having a baby is a wonderfully happy time, it is also a stressful one, so it pays for new parents to get their finances in order before the baby is born.
lead_paragraph: Having a baby is a wonderfully happy time and also a stressful one, so it pays to get your financial house in order for the sake of you, your partner and your new child.

headline.seo: Your Money: Financial and Legal Advice for Expectant Parents
headline.main: For Parents-to-Be, a Few Financial and Legal Tips
headline.print_headline: For Parents-to-Be, a Few Financial and Legal Tips
